GSP33brsvbh2u:4: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇāya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha-prathame 'dhyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:9: tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:11: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:15: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'ityatra,
GSP33brsvbh2u:16: yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:17: api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:25: api ca tarko 'pi kapilādismṛtiranumanyate, tasmādapyetadeva prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:29: tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:30: tasmādavigānācchrauta evārtha āstheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:31: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha-vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:38: kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:42: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:43: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāśvāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:48: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:52: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:55: tataśca teṣāṃ smṛtiḥ kapilasmṛtiviruddhāvaheyetyata āha-bhavati cānyā manoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:57: na kevalaṃ manoḥ smṛtiḥ smṛtyantarasaṃvādinī, śrutisaṃvādinyapītyāha-śrutiśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:60: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha-vedasya hi nirapekṣamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:61: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-satyaṃ śāstrayonirīśvarastathāpyasya na śāstrakriyāyāmasti svātantryaṃ kapilādīnāmiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:62: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān /
GSP33brsvbh2u:63: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:64: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:65: śāstrārthajñānaṃ cāsya svayamāvirbhavadapi na śāstrakāraṇatāmupaiti, dvayorapyaparyāyeṇāvirbhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:66: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:69_1: siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:74: tadvikārāṇāṃ tu mahadādīnāṃ tānyapi na sandhi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:76: tasmādātyantikāt pramāṇāntarāsaṃvādāt pramāṇamūlatvācca smṛtermūlābhāvādabhāvo vandhyāyā iva dauhitryasmṛteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:78: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:82: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:88: tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:91: anyaparādapi cānyanimittaṃ tatpratīyamānamabhyupeyeta, yadi na mānāntareṇa virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:94: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:97: yogaṃ vyutpipādayiṣatā nimittamātreṇeha guṇā uktāḥ, na tu bhāvataḥ, teṣāmatāttvikatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:103: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:108: naca tadapramāṇaṃ pradhānādau, pramāṇaṃ ca yamādāviti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:110: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkvacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:113: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:118: tasmānna pradhānādiparaṃ tat, kintu tannimittīkṛtya yogavyutpādanaparamityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:124: tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha-satīṣvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:125: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:126: tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:131: saṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:135: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:140: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt | BBs_2,1.4 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:150: nanvastu virodhaḥ, tathāpi tarkādare ko heturityata āha-yathā ca śrutīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:151_0: sāvakāśā bahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante
GSP33brsvbh2u:152: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:153: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:156: api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha-śrutiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:157: so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate-'prakṛtyā saha sārūpyaṃ vikārāṇāmavasthitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:158: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33brsvbh2u:161: 'tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapatnīnāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte /
GSP33brsvbh2u:163: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh2u:164: brahma tu cetanaṃ viśuddhaṃ ca, niratiśayatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:165: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:166: ye tu cetanabrahmavikāratayā jagaccaitanyamāhustānpratyāha-acetanaṃ cedaṃ jagaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:176: paramasādhānaṃ tu sūtrāvayavena vaktuṃ tamevāvatārayati-na cetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:178: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodbalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchrūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:184: na pṛthivyādīnāṃ caitanyamāthameva, kintu bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ sākṣādevārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:188: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:190: tenaitacchrutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:193_0: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakārakatvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:193_1: 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat'iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:194: devatāśabdakṛto vātra viśeṣo viśeṣaśabdenocyata ityāha-api ca kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:197: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat'ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:200_0: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:200_1: darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha-prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:202: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye bhāktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:208: prakṛtivikārabhāve hetuṃ sārūpyaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati-atyantasārūpye ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:209: prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvahetuṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati-vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:217: yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ sikatāṃ bhakṣayet'ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:226: tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:231: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:235: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:238: cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi caitanyasyānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ yojayitumityāha-yo 'pi cetanakāraṇaśravaṇabaleneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:251: tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:252: nāsti cedasadutpadyata iti satkāryavādavyākopa ityāha-yadi cetanaṃ śuddhamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:257: yathā kāryaṃ svarūpeṇa sadasattvābhyāṃ na nirvacanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:258: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:259: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:260: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brsvbh2u:265_0: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgusaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:265_1: rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:266: na cānyathā layo lokasiddha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:268: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāme vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:279: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:280: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:283: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śuktirna ca śuktī rajatamevamidamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:284: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:285: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma,
GSP33brsvbh2u:297: tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9//
GSP33brsvbh2u:302_1: nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:308: kevalāgamagamyer'the svatantratarkāviṣaye na sāṃkhyādivat sādharmyavaidharmyamātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyo yena pradhānādisiddhirbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:321: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'bhyupeyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:326: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate, tadabhāve vicārāpravṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:329: na vayamanyatra tarkamapramāṇayāmaḥ, kintu jagatkāraṇasattve svābhāvikapratibandhavanna liṅgamasti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:332: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:334: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:335: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:340: na kāryaṃ kāraṇādabhinnamabhede kāraṇarūpavat kāryatvānupapatteḥ, karotyarthānupapatteśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:342: na cāsya kāraṇātmatve kiñcidabhūtamasti, yadarthamayaṃ puruṣo yateta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:344: tasyā api kāraṇātmatvena sattvāt, asattve vābhivyaṅgyasyāpi tadvatprasaṅgena kāraṇātmatvavyāghātāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:345: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:346: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh2u:351: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtīni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:354: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:363: yasyābhūtvā bhavataḥ samavāyastadupādeyaṃ yatra ca samavāyastadupādānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:367: tasmādyatredamalpatāratamyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:369_0: tasmāt paramamahato brahmaṇa upādānādabhinnamupādeyaṃ jagatkāryamabhidadhatī śrutiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:372: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiteḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:373: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyatarkasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:375: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste ca kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:383: tatkathaṃ punastarkanimitta ākṣepa ityata āha-yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:384: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:401: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoṣaprapañcāvatāra ityata āha-vyatirekeṇābhāvaḥ kāryasyāvagamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:402: na khalvananyatvamityabhedaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu bhedaṃ vyāsedhāmaḥ, tataśca nābhedāśrayadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:405: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:406: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:411: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:414: na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ-'vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:415: vācayā kevalamārabhyate vikārajātaṃ, na tu tattvato 'sti, yato nāmadheyamātrametat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:416: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:420: tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:423: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:427: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:428: na caivaṃ vikārajātaṃ, tasya kadācit kathañcit kutracidavasthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:432: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kvacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:435: tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ kasyacit /
GSP33brsvbh2u:445: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:446: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:447: athaiṣa prasajyapratiṣedho nirucyatāṃ, kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:448: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:451: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:453: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam'ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:454: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ'iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:459: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:461: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:463: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:466: mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:469: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:475: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:477: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:478: so 'yaṃ niyamaḥ kāryakāraṇayoraikāntikaṃ bhedamupakalpayati, anirvacanīyatāṃ vā kāryasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:483: na brahmaṇo jīvabhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ, kintu bhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:484: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasahitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha-svayaṃ prasiddha hīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:486: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha-bādhite ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:487: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:488: sa ca yathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:490: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet'ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata iti na brūte,
GSP33brsvbh2u:493: naca tāvatāsau mithyājñānanibandhano bhavatyevamatrāpītyata āha-na cāyaṃ vyavahārābhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:496: api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:499: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:507: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:511: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha-mokṣaśāstrasyāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:518: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brsvbh2u:528: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa'iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati-kathaṃ tvasatyeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:534: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:536: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:537: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:538: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:539: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:543: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:544: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:545: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:549: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:552: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na daṃśavedanāmāpnoti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:553: pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:559: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:560: tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi laukikābhiprāyeṇaitaduktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:562_2: svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno
GSP33brsvbh2u:571: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo 'pi tvīdṛśo rekhābhedo 'kāraṃ īdṛśaśca kakāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:574: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:576: yadi khalvekatvānekatvanibandhanau vyavahārāvekasya puṃso 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavatastatastadarthamubhayasadbhāvaḥ kalpyeta, na tvetadasti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:585: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca na prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:587: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:589: avidyānivṛttiśca na tatkāryatayā phalamapi tviṣṭatayā, iṣṭalakṣaṇatvātphalasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:599: satyaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādāt, anṛtaṃ ca vicārāsahatayānirvācyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:601: anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati-tasmādantyena pramāṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:609: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:610: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na hyekasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:612: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:616: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kūṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:618: bāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:619: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:620: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha-naca yathā brahmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:622: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati-kūṭasthabrahmātmavādina iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:625: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:626: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:632: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:636: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:647: paṭa iti hi pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:651: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:654: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama, anyonyāśrayatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:655: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:658: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat,
GSP33brsvbh2u:659: avāntarakāraṇāni ca tanvādayaḥ sarve 'nirvācyā evetyāha-tathā ca tantuṣviti //15//
GSP33brsvbh2u:664: na kevalaṃ śrutiḥ, upapattiścātra bhavatiyacca yadātmaneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:665: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:668: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:672: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kvacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kvacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:674: sattvaṃ cet kimato yadyevamityata āha-ekaṃ ca punariti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:677: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:683: abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve tadanupapatterabhedagrahopādānaiva bhedakalpaneti sarvabhavadātam //16//
GSP33brsvbh2u:692: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:693: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:694: sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha-śaktiśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:698: anabhyupagamyamāne casamavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:702: sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:703: tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbaddhuṃ na saṃbandhāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:706: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:709: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:712: tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:719: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha-nahi bahutvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:721: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:723: avayavī tu na svarūpeṇāvayavānvyāpnotiṃ, api tvavayavaśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:724: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi tasyopalabdheḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:729: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kvāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:734: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:735: teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha-ghaṭasya cotpattirucyamāneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:736: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:741: tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ notpattyadhiṣṭhānatvamastīti pāriśeṣyādghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteradhiṣṭhānameṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:743: evañca ghaṭo bhavatīti ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:744: taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:752: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasyeti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena maryādākaraṇamanupapannamityāha-abhāvasya ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:754: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:755: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha-yadi vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:756: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:759: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:764: evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat,
GSP33brsvbh2u:765: anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:777: paṭavacca | BBs_2,1.19 | yathā ca prāṇādi | BBs_2,1.20 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:778: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19//
GSP33brsvbh2u:785: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:786: naca bhedābhedāvekatra samavetau virodhāt, naca bhedastāttvika ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:799: satyamayaṃ paramātmā sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān paśyati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:800: paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:801: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:807: yadi brahmaviṣarto jagat, hanta sarvasyaiva jīvavacaitanyaprasaṅga ityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh2u:812: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi | BBs_2,1.24 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:813: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vividhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:819: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:823: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyedamucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:824: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:826: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:829: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva pariṇāmāntaramāsādayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:831: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram'iti kāryakrameṇa tatparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:837: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣaṇānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:846: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:847: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:849: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:853_2: pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityapabādhyaśrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:853_3: hi'iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:865: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28//
GSP33brsvbh2u:871: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:872: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:881: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:882: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:888: paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ māyāvādināmityāha-parihṛtastviti //29//
GSP33brsvbh2u:891: vicitraśaktitvamuktaṃ brahmaṇa, tatra śrutyupanyāsaparaṃ sūtram-sarvopetā ca taddarśanāt //30//
GSP33brsvbh2u:895: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam | BBs_2,1.31 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:896: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:898: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātreṇāpahnavamarhatīti //31//
GSP33brsvbh2u:904: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:911: tasmāt prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā tadabhāve 'nupapannā brahmopādānatāṃ jagataḥ pratikṣipatīti prāptam //32//
GSP33brsvbh2u:916: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:921: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām'iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:923: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:928_1: līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh2u:929: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:932: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:933: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:934: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:935: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam, api tvanādyavidyānibandhanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:936: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:939: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturiti cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata ityāha-na ceyaṃ paramārthaviṣayeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:940: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:941: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha-brahmātmabhāveti //33//
GSP33brsvbh2u:944: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati | BBs_2,1.34 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:947: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:948: sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:949: tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:953: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:954: sa hi prāṇabhṛtkarmāśayānāṃ vṛttinirodhasamayaḥ, tamitalaṅghayannayamayuktakārī syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:957_0: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma
GSP33brsvbh2u:957_1: kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate'iti śruterīśvara eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī
GSP33brsvbh2u:957_2: karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:960: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteravagamyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:962: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:964: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:970: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabhedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:972: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34//
GSP33brsvbh2u:976: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād | BBs_2,1.35 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:982: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:989: sa ca rāgādibhiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:992: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:994_0: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:994_1: vāsanāḥ karmapravṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:998_0: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam'iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1003: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1008: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1009: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh2u:1017: iha hi pāde svatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1019: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1021: nahi vedāntavākyāni nirṇetavyānīti nirṇīyante, kintu mokṣamāṇānāṃ tattvajñānotpādanāya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1024: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1025: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1028: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1029: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1030: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha--vedāntārthanirṇayasya ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1036: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1039: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni dṛṣṭāni,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1040: yathā ghaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1041: tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1045: yā ca mohātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1047: yathā maitradāreṣu padmāvatyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃprati satvaguṇasamudbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1048: tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, tāḥ pratyasyā rajoguṇasamudbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1049: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1054: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1056: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1058: tathā hyāhuḥ---'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1063: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitaṃ cetanena pravartate svabhāvata eveti sādhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1068: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ viruddham,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1069: evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1077: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1082: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1085: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1086: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1090: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1093: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1094: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1101: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1104: yadi tāvatparimitatvamiyattā, sā nabhaso 'pi nāstītyavyāpako hetuḥ parimāṇāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1105: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1107: nahi kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpi, kintu kāraṇaṃ kāryavyāpīti parimitaṃ nabhastanmātrādyavyāpitvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1110: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti, mithaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1112: nahi citiśaṅktiḥ kūṭasthanityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate, tataśca tadavyāpakā guṇā iti parimitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1113: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1118: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1121: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1123: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtrādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1124: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca'ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1126: ayamabhiprāyaḥ--tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmaddhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1129: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha--satyametat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1133: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1137: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1140: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1142: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1143: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1144: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1145: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1146: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati--tadabhidhīyate--na brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1147: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1148: sādhanīyaḥ, kevalamasya pravṛtti prati kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1149: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ pravṛtterniścīyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1154: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1155: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati--nanu taveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1159: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1160: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1162: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1165: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1167: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1169: etaduktaṃ bhavati--neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1170: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1180: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1187: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1191: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha--upasaṃhāradarśanāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1192: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1196: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1197: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1201: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1203: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī
GSP33brsvbh2u:1208: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1210: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1211: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate, uta cetanam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1212: na tāvannimittāntaraṃ, dhenudehasthasyaudaryasya vahnyādibhedasya nimittāntarasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1213: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1222: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1224: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1228: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1230: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1236: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1239: atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1241: hantāyāṃ sakṛcchabdādyupabhogena kṛtaprayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛttimātrādeva sidhyatīti kṛtaṃ sattvānyatākhyātipratīkṣaṇena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1244: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1251: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1253: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1254: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1255: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1261: puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1263: na kevalamabhyupetahānam, ayuktaṃ caitadbhavaddarśanālocanenetyāha-kathaṃ codāsīna iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1269: yadi pradhānāvasthā kūṭasthanityā, tato na tasyāḥ prācyutiranityatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1270: yathāhuḥ--'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1278: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1283: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1299: nahi tapirastiriva kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ, kintu paciriva karmasthabhāvakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1301: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1303: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1306: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1307: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1328: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yodheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1336: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika ityasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1337: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmityasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1338: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya tapikarmatāmākhyātumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1340: kevalamanena sattvaṃ tapyam, abhyupeyaṃ tāpakaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1341: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1347: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1352: tasya ca buddhisatvasya tāmasaviparyāsādātmanaḥ puruṣādbhedamapaśyataḥ puruṣastapyata ityabhimānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1354: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1356: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1361: atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1362: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1363: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1364: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti tāpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1366: cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1370: yathaiva pradhānakāraṇavādo brahmakāraṇavādavirodhyevaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādo 'pyataḥ so 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1371: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ'ityasya prapañca ārabhyate--tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1381: tasya tu sāvayavatve 'bhyupagamyamāne 'nantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1384: bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1387: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1390: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta, teṣāmanārabdhatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1393: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1398: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1404: tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇetyārambhavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1405: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇuṇaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1408: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1409: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva guṇāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1414: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1415: na tu mahattvaguṇopajanane dvyaṇukagataṃ mahattvamapekṣate, tasya hṛsvatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1416: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1419: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1422: na dvyaṇuke 'ṇutvamapi pāramāṇuvarti pārimāṇḍalyamārabhate, tasya hi
GSP33brsvbh2u:1425: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1427: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1431: tadevaṃ yojanīyam--dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1432: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1433: athāvyavasthitā tathāpi tadavastho vyabhicāra ityāha--yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇava iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1434: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1437: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusaraṇe khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1438: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1442: naca kāraṇabahutvādīnāṃ saṃnidhānamasaṃnidhānaṃ ca pārimāṇḍalyasyetyāha--naca parimāṇāntarārambhe iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1453: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1457: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1468: gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1476: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1478: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1479: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1485: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1492: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha--nahi tatrāpi kiñcinniyatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1497: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1502: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau ghaṭayitumarhatyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1505: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1507: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1514: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1519: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1522: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1525: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1526: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto 'pyasti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1528: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1529: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1535: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1546: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti bhavadbhirabhyupeyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1547: tasya cedrūpādimattvamabhyupeyeta paramāṇutvanityatvaviruddhe sthaulyānityatve prasajyeyātāṃ, so 'yaṃ prasaṅga
GSP33brsvbh2u:1550: tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1552: paramāṇunityatvasādhanāni ca teṣāmupanyasya dūṣayati--yacca nityatve kāraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1558: tenānityamiti laukikena niṣedhenānyatra nityatvasadbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ, te cānye paramāṇava iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1561: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1564: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1566: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyetatathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1571: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1578: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)
GSP33brsvbh2u:1581: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1584: tathāhi--mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1585: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1587: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenākāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1589: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1590: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1593: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā pariṇataṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1594: na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1598: evaṃ mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ piṇḍivasthāmapahāya kulālahemakārādi vyāpārādghaṭarucakīdyavasthāmāpadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1603: tasmātsāmānyasya paramārthasato 'nirvācyā viśeṣāvasthāstadadhiṣṭhānā bhujaṅgādaya iva rajjvādyupādānāṃ upajanāpāyadharmāṇa iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1616: triguṇastu tato vahniḥ sa śabdasparśavān bhavet //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1617: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasamātraṃ samāviśat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1622: śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca viśeṣāstena te smṛtāḥ //5//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1625: tathā ca yathāyathā saṃhanyamānānāmupacayastathātathā saṃhatasya sthaulyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1628: astu tāvacchabdo vaiśeṣikaistasya pṛthivyādiguṇatvenānabhyupagamāditi catvāri bhūtāni catustridvyekaguṇānyudāhṛtavān /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1635: yastu brūte na gandhādisaṃghātaḥ paramāṇurapi tu gandhādyāśrayo dravyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1640: natāvat paramāṇavo rūpato gṛhyante kintu kāryadvārā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1642: yadā na tadādhāratayā gṛhyate 'pi tu tadātmakatayā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1643: tathā ca teṣāmupacaye tadupacitaṃ dṛṣṭamiti paramāṇubhirapi tatkāraṇairevaṃ bhavitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1653: saṃpratyutsūtraṃ bhāṣyakṛdvaiśeṣikatantraṃ dūṣayati-api ca vaiśeṣikā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1655: na hi yathā gavāśvamahiṣamātaṅgāḥ parasparānadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā nirūpyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1656: vanhyādyanadhīnotpattayo vā dhūmādayo yathā vanhyādyanadhīnanirūpaṇāḥ svatantrā nirūpyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1658: api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1659: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1662: na tadadhīnotpādatāṃ tadadhīnatvamācakṣmahe kintu tadākāratāṃ, tathā ca na vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1664: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyete tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1672: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1674: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1685: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1687: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1688: na ca pratyakṣaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyayaḥ samavāyagocaraḥ, tadviruddhārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1690: hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1693: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1695: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1704: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1705: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1707: evaṃ hi sati samavāyasya nityatvābhyupagamāt kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1708: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1712: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1722: naca tantupaṭayoḥ saṃbandhastathā, utpannamātrasyaiva paṭasya tantusaṃbandhāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1724: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1728: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1729: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1733: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1734: saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha--nāpi saṃyogasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1742: parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1755: kiñcānyat dvābhyāmaṇubhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sāvayavasya kāryasyadvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1756: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1757: ata eva saṃyogādanyaḥkāryakāraṇadravyayorāśrayāśritabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1764: ye hi paricchinnāste sāvayavāḥ, yathā ghaṭādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1765: tathā ca paramāṇavaḥ, tasmātsāvayavā anityāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1769: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam--vastubhūtāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1776: api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1777: evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1781: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17//
GSP33brsvbh2u:1788: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1790: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1794: tadidaṃ dūṣaṇāya vaināśikamatamupanyasituṃ tatprakārabhedānāha--sa ca bahuprakāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1795: vādivaicitryāt khalu, kecitsarvāstitvameva rāddhāntaṃ pratipadyante kecijjhānamātrāstitvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1797: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1802: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1811: pṛthivī svarasvabhāvā, āpaḥ snehasvabhāvāḥ, agniruṣṇasvabhāvaḥ, vāyurīraṇasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1814: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1815: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1817: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1819: yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1820: saṃskāraskandho rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ, upakleśāśca madamānādayaḥ, dharmādharmau ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1824: rūpavijñānādiskandhahetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike 'bhipreyamāṇe tadaprāptistasya samudāyasyāyuktatā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1827: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1828: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpāriṇī viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1829: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1831_2: cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva evāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:1834: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:1846: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1851: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1860: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1873: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1875: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ--yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1876: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1877: sati tu bīje 'ṅkuro bhavati, yāvat puṣpe sati phalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1878: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1879: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1880: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1882: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1886: hetuṃ hetuṃ pratyayante hetvantarāṇīti, teṣāmayamānānāṃ bhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1889: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1895: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1896: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1900: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1901: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādīti avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārā ajaniṣyanta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1905: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1906: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1907: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1908: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1918: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1920: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1921: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1942: sparśādvedanā sukhādikā, vedanāyāṃ satyāṃ kartavyametatsukhaṃ punarmayetyadhyavasānantṛṣṇā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1944: tato bhavo bhavatyasmājjanmeti bhavo dharmādharmau, taddhetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥjanma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1949: tadutthaṃ pralapanaṃ hā mātaḥ, hā tāta, hā ca me putrakalatrādītiparidevanā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1954: janmādihetukā avidyādayo 'vidyādihetukāśca janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhirākṣiptaḥ saṃghāta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1956: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ--yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1966: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1968: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1969: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaivamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1971: tāṃśca sarvānanapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na notpattumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1972: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1973: na ca kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ, sāmagryā ekatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1977_0: hantānena krameṇa tataḥ pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana
GSP33brsvbh2u:1977_2: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33brsvbh2u:1977_3: tadanantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:1978: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1979: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1989: tatra na tāvat kāraṇamanyathānupapadyamānaṃ kāryamutpādayati, kintu
GSP33brsvbh2u:1993: tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryadhiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,
GSP33brsvbh2u:1996: sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti dūrotsāritatvaṃ darśayati--bhoktṛrahiteṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:1997: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2003: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣetāpi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2006: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2007: astu tāvadyathā kevalāddhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2009: saṃprati pratyayopanibandhanaṃ pratītyasamutpādamāstāya codayati--atha manyase saṃghātā eveti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2010: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2017: khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet, āsādya vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2021: tasmādanenāgantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2024: aprāptabhogo hi bhogārthī bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2025: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2027: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2042: na tāvadvaiśeṣikavannirodhakāraṇasāṃnidhyaṃ nirudhyamānatā svīkriyate vaināśikairakāraṇaṃ vināśamabhyupagacchadbhistasyāniṣṭhatvād /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2046: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2047: tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2049: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prāyeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2050: tathā ca sthiratvam, itarathā tu lokavirodha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2052: yathāhuḥ--'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2053: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha--tathāpi naivopapadyatekṣaṇikasya kāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2055: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2056: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2058: anugame vā tadeva kāraṇaṃ, tathā ca tasya kāryatādātmyamiti siddhimakṣaṇikatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2059: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāpta ityatiprasaṅga ityāha--vinaiva veti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2060: naca tadbhāvabhāvo niyāmakaḥ, tasyaikasmin kṣaṇe 'śakyagrahatvāt, sāmānyasya cākāraṇatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2062: api cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha--api cotpādanirodhau nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2075: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryetānyeva kāraṇāni /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2083: bhāvapratīpā saṃkhyā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā, tayā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2088: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2091: sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2094: anārambhe tu bhavedantyaḥ saḥ, kintu syādasan, arthakriyākāritāyāḥ sattālakṣaṇasya virahāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2095: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2101: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2104: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2106: tathāpi doṣāntaramubhayasminnapi nirodho brūte--na hi bhāvānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2107: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2114: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2119: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha--aspaṣṭapratyabhijñānāsvapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2120: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2122: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum 'udabindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2136: tathāhi--jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2140: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2150_1: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha--api
GSP33brsvbh2u:2155: naca sādṛśyanibandhanaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ, pūrvāparakṣaṇadarśina ekasyābhāve tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2159: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2163: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2164: na caikasya jñānasya nānākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati, ekatvavirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2166: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2169: yadyucyeta astyetasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha
GSP33brsvbh2u:2175: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2179: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2180: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2181: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2183: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha--evamevaiṣor'tha iti niścitaṃ yattadeva vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2187: athānyā socyatāṃ, nanūktā taireva svapratibhāse 'narther'thādhyavasāyena pravṛttiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2192: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2194: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2197: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2203: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2204: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2205: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2207: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2209: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2213: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2214: na ca bhedāgrahamātreṇa samāropābhidhānaṃ, vaiśadyāvaiśadyarūpatayā bhedagrahasyoktatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2216: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2219: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha--nacāyaṃ sādṛśyātsaṃvyavahāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2220: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamanibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tathehāpi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2222: tathāhi--vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2237: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ--kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2238: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2241: yadyucyeta samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2248: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra
GSP33brsvbh2u:2249: eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2253: tathā cākiñcitkarādapi cet kūṭasthātkāryaṃ jāyeta, sarvaṃ sarvasmājjāyeteti sūktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2263: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2265: api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2271: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2273: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2276: na caitāvatā sthirasyākāraṇatvaṃ, tadupādānatvātkāryasya, rajjūpādānatvamiva bhujaṅgasyetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2278: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2281: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2282: naca bījāṅguratve sāmānye paramārthasatī, yenaitayorbhāvikaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2287: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratanyate vistarabhayāt //26//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2297: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catasṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmanyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2298: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā eṣitavyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2300: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha--tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2302: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenāntastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2305: na hi brahmavādino nīlādyākārāṃ vittimabhyupagacchanti, kintvanirvacanīyaṃ nīlādīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2308: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha--satyapi bāhyer'tha iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2310: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2314: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusadbhyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2325: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2331: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2332: yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, addhā, tathāsati hi svāṃśālambanameva vijñānamabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2342: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2346: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyanna ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2350_0: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu
GSP33brsvbh2u:2350_1: vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2351: tasmāt kalpanāṣoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvādghaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2361: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2363: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2367: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2369: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2370: taduktam--'na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2373: sa cedvijñānasya nārthasadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇamastītyāha--apicānubhavamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2375: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate, yathaikasmāccandramaso dvitīyaścandramāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2377: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopalabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2378: so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2383: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ, yathā svapnamāyādipratyayaḥ, tathā
GSP33brsvbh2u:2385: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2386: atrāntare sautrāntikaścodayati--kathaṃ punarasati bāhyer'the nīlamidaṃ pītamityādipratyayavaicitryamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2387: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2389: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2393: tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2397: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2398: sattve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2399: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2401: sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2403: sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2404: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2406: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2409: tathāhi--bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2411: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati, pītajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2415: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2416: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2417: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2418: nanūktaṃ na kṣaṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ śaktibhedābhedau, bhinnānāmapi kṣaṇānāmekasāmarthyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2419: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2421: tasmāt kṣaṇabhede 'pi na sāmarthyabhedaḥ, saṃtānabhede tu sāmarthyaṃ bhidyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2424: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2426: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2427: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2428: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2429: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2442: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2445: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /
