GSP33brsvbh2u:2450: idamatrākūtam--ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2455: na ca tāvat paramāṇvābhāsamekajñānam, ekasya nānātmatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2459: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2461: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ-'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2466: yacca jñānasya pratyarthaṃ vyavasthāyai viṣayasārūpyamāsthitaṃ, naitena viṣayo 'pahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2467: asatyarthe tatsārūpyasya tadvyavasthāyāścānupapatterityāha-na ca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyāditi //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2468: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ so 'pi vikalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2469: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2473: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upalambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2477: tatrāha--ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2478: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2482: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2485: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2487: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛttaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2498: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2499: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:2501: tatsarvaṃ vijñānasya svāṃśālambane 'nupapannamityāha--api ca dvayorvijñānayoḥ pūrvottarakālayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2502: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2503: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2505: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu tadatiriktor'thaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2510: ayamarthaḥ--svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2511: na hi cakṣuriva tannilīnamarthe kañcanātiśayamādhatte, yenārthamapratyakṣaṃ satpratyakṣayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2514: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2515: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2522: apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2526: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'nubhava utpannaśca, na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣo bhavati, yathā nīlādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2532: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2533: nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2534: evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2536: kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2537: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2538: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇākāṅkṣānutpādāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2544: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2548: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2550: syādetat yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha--svayaṃsiddhasya ca sākṣiṇo 'pratyākhyeyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2557_1: svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2562: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2565_0: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā
GSP33brsvbh2u:2567: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā nāvagantṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2577: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2579: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2580: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2589: sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2592: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2604: prāgutpannasya cādheyotpādasamaye 'sataḥ kṣaṇikatvavyāghāta ityāśayavānāha--api ca vāsanā nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2610: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattvena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2619: tadetannirācikīrṣurāha--śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2621: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:2624: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2626: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2627: tathāca bhinnaviṣayatvānna sarvapramāṇavipratiṣedha ityata āha--nahyeyaṃ sarvapramāṇaprasiddho lalokavyavahāro 'nyatattvamanadhigamya śakyate 'pahnotum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2628: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2630: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2632: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2633: tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2634: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2636: kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2638: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2641: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2644: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2647: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2648: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2650: tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2657: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti //32//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2671: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā-pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2682: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2688: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2690: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2698: ārhatadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2699: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2702: aghātāni karmāṇi, tadyathā vedanīyaṃ karma śuklapudgalavipākahetuḥ, taddhi
GSP33brsvbh2u:2712: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastadvimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchatyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2726: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam--'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2727: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2730: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2731_0: tathāhi--yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti
GSP33brsvbh2u:2731_1: na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2733: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2735: vibhajate--na hyekasmindharmaṇi paramārthasati paramārthasatāṃyugapatsattvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parasparaparihārasvarūpāṇāṃsamāveśaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2737: vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpeṇāstyeva na nāsti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2745: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2746: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2747: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2749_0: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca
GSP33brsvbh2u:2749_1: pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye
GSP33brsvbh2u:2750: nirdhāraṇasya caikāntasattve sarvatra nānekāntavāda ityāha--ya ete sapta padārthā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2758: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2761: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2763: tathā hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārtsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2767: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi puttikāhastidehayorityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2780: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ | BBs_2,2.35 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:2786: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2787: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2788: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2791: pūrvasūtraprasañjitāyāṃ jīvānityatāyāṃ bauddhavatsaṃtānanityatāmāśaṅkyedaṃ sūtram--'na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2792: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2801: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2811: ekaśarīraparimāṇatā na dīpyā, kintvekaparimāṇatāmātramaṇurmahān veti vivekaḥ //36//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2819: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2826: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ tadvimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2827: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ--cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvamātraṃ na tūpādānatvamapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2841: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpyamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2842: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2843: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaviparyaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2848: ayamarthaḥ--yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2851: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2852: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2853: tasmātsvatantro 'pīśvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2857: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2862: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2865: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2867: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha--svārthaprayukta eva ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2868: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2869: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha--svārthavatvādīśvarasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2877: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2880: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2891: āgamo hi pravṛtti prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2895: asmākaṃ tvīśvarāgamayoranāditvādīśvarayonitve 'pyāgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2906: rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2908: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īśvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2916: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābhedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2918: asmākaṃ tvāgamagamyer'the tadbādhitaviṣayatayā nānumānaṃ prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2919: svarūpaparimāṇamapi yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2920: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2922: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2938: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2939: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:2940: tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2951: mā bhūdabhyupagamena doṣaḥ, prakārāntareṇa svayameva doṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2954: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2957: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt, siddhāntahāniśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2965: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte--ātmāna evaite bhagavanto vāsudevā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2966: ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano bhedamabhidhāyātmana evaita iti tadviruddhābhedābhidhānamaparaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2968: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2969: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh2u:2982: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate, siddhānte tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2984: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2985: tathāca viyato nityatvāttejaḥpramukha eva sargaḥ, tathāca na virodhaḥ śrutīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2988: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh2u:2993: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2994: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:2996: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvighātāya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3002: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare tu dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3003: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3010: samavāyyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3012: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3014: na cākāśasya tādṛśo viśeṣa utpādānutpādayorasti, tasmānnotpadyata ityāha-utpattimatāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3043_0: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3048: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3050: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3051: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3053: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3054: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3055: tadevaṃ siddhāntaikadeśini dūṣitepūrvapakṣī svapakṣe viśeṣamāha-satyaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3061: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha-nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhāneti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3063: sa ca śrutyantareṇa virodhinā bādhyate, jaghanyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3069: hanta bhoḥ kathamekasya sraṣṭuranekavyāpāratvamaviruddhamityata āha-sraṣṭā tveko 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3073: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha-nacāsmābhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3077: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3089: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3090: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3091: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati natvalpatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3093: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3096: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha-
GSP33brsvbh2u:3106: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3116: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3120: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3125: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha-tathā bhasmībhavatyapīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3128: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3131: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūktaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3133: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3139: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3141: 'vāyuścāntarikṣametadamṛtam'iti dvayoramṛtatvamuktvā punaḥ pavanasya viśeṣeṇāha-saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3151: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3156: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3160: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3165: sadekasvabhāvaṃ hi brahma śrūyate tadasati bādhake nānyathayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3166: uktametadvikārāḥ sattvenānubhūtā api katipayakālakalātikrame vinaśyanto dṛśyanta ityanirvacanīyāstraikālyāvacchedāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3167: na cātmā tādṛśastasya śruteranubhāvādvā vartamānaikasvabhāvatvaina prasiddhestadidamāha-sanmātraṃ hi brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3168: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatsvabhāvādvicalati tadanirvacanīyaṃ nirvacanīyopādānaṃ yuktaṃ, na tu viparyayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3169: yathā rajjūpādānaḥ sarpo na tu sarpopādānā rajjuriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3173: pāramārthiko hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nādirnānavasthayā duṣyati. samāropastu vikārasya na samāropitopādāna ityupapāditaṃ mādhyamikamataniṣedhādhikāre,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3178: ye tu guṇadikkālotpattiviṣayamidamadhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrustaiḥ 'sato 'nupapatteḥ'iti kleśena vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3188: naca sākṣādbrahmajatvasaṃbhave tadvaṃśyatvena tajjatvaṃ paraṃparayāśrayituṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3190: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ paśuyāgavājapeyoraṅgāṅginornānātvāttatra sākṣādvājapeyāsaṃbandhe kleśena paraṃparāśrayaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3191_0: iha tu vāyorbrahmavikārasyāpi brahmaṇo vastuto 'nanyatvādvayūpādānatve sākṣādeva
GSP33brsvbh2u:3193: yathā tasyāḥ śṛtamiti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparāmātrasāmyena na tu sarvathāṃ sāmyeneti sarvamavadātam //10//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3201: annaśabdo 'yaṃ vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhiyavādau tadvikāre caudane pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3203: sā ca vākyaśeṣeṇopodbalitā 'yatra kvacana varṣati'ityetena tasmādabhyavahāryaṃ vrīhiyavādyevātrādbhyo jāyata iti vivakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3205: nahi pṛthivyapi kṛṣṇā, lohitādirūpāyā api darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3206: tataśca śrutyantareṇa 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ'ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3208: tatra kim 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti pṛthivīśabdo 'nnaparatayā nīyatāmuta 'annamasṛjata'ityannaśabdaḥ pṛthivīparatayeti viśaye,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3214: idānīmākāśādibhūtādhiṣṭhātryo devatāḥ kiṃ svatantrā evottarottarabhūtasarge pravartanta uta parameśvarādhiṣṭhitāḥ paratantrā iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3215: tatra 'ākāśādvāyurvāyuragniḥ'iti svavākye nirapekṣāṇāṃ śruteḥ svayañcetanānāṃ ca cetanāntarāpekṣāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3216: prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇāpi mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa upapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3217: svatantrāṇāmevākāśādīnāṃ vāyvādikāraṇatvamiti jagato brahmayonitvavyāghāta iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3220: naca cetanānāṃ svakāryasvātantryamityetadapyaikāntikaṃ paratantrāṇāmapi teṣāṃ bahulamupalabdherbhṛtyāntevāsyādivat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3221: tasmālliṅgaprastāvasāmañjasyāya sa īśvara eva tena tenākāśādibhāvenopādānabhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ svayamadhiṣṭhāya nimittakāraṇabhūtastaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ vāyvādikaṃ sṛjatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3225: tasmātsarvasya kāryajātasya sākṣātparameśvara evādhiṣṭhātā nimittakāraṇaṃ na tvākāśādibhāvamāpannaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3229: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca | BBs_2,3.14 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:3230: utpattau mahābhūtānāṃ kramaḥ śruto nāpyaye 'pyayamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3234_0: tatra kramabhedāpekṣāyāṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭo 'pyayakramo ghaṭādīnāṃ mahābhūtāpyayakramaniyāmako
GSP33brsvbh2u:3234_1: 'stvāho śrauta utpattikrama iti viśaye śrautasya śrautāntaramabhyarhitaṃ samānajātīyatayā
GSP33brsvbh2u:3236: tasmācchrautenaivotpattikrameṇāpyayakramo niyamyata iti prāpta ucyate-apyayasya kramāpekṣāyāṃ khalūtpattikramo niyāmako bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3249: tadevaṃ bhāvanopayoginau bhūtānāmutpattipralayau vicārya buddhīndriyamanasāṃ kramaṃ vicārayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3250: atra ca vijñāyate 'neneti vyutpattyā vijñānaśabdenendriyāṇi ca buddhiṃ ca brūte /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3251: tatraiteṣāṃ kramāpekṣāyāmātmānaṃ ca bhūtāni cāntarā samāmnānāttenaiva pāṭhena kramo niyamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3253: yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaśca bhūtānīti pratīyate, tasmādātmana ākāśa iti bhajyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3254_0: annamayamiti ca mayaḍānandamaya itivat na vikārārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-vibhaktatvāttāvanmanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3254_1: kāraṇāpekṣāyāmannamayaṃ mana ityādiliṅgaśravaṇādapekṣitārthakathanāya vikārārthatvameva mayaṭo yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3258: evaṃ codbhūtavikārā mana ādayo bhūtānāṃ parastādutpadyanta iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3260: bhavatvātmana eva karaṇānāmutpattiḥ, na khalvetāvatā bhūtairātmano notpattavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3267: devadattādināmadheyaṃ tāvajjīvātmano na śarīrasya, tannāmne śarīrāya śrāddhādikaraṇānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3268: tanmṛto devadatto jāto devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhyatvaṃ manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3273: ata eva smaranti 'evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3280: ākāśāderiva tu mahāsargādau tadante cotpattivināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti śaṅkāntaramapanetumidamārabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3290: 'yathāgneḥ śrudrā visphaliṅgaḥ'iti ca śrutiḥ sākṣādeva brahmavikāratvaṃ jīvānāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3291: 'yathā sūdīptāt pāvakāt'iti ca brahmaṇo jīvānāmutpattiṃ ca tatrāpyayaṃ ca sākṣāddarśayati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3297: evaṃ hi kasyāñcicchākhāyāmāmnātasya katipāyāṅgasahitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntarīyāṅgopasaṃhāro na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3299: tasmādākāśavajjīvātmāna utpadyanta iti prāpta ucyate-bhavedevaṃ yadi jīvā brahmaṇo bhidyeran /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3302_0: upādhīnā ca manomaya ityādīnāṃ śruterbhūyasīnāṃ ca nityatvājatvādigocarāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3302_2: ca 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ'iti śrutyaivoktatvānnityā jīvātmano na vikārā na
GSP33brsvbh2u:3307: karmaṇā hi jānātyartho vyāptastadabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3314: na tu vyomna ivendriyādisaṃnikarṣe 'pyeṣā jñānaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3315: tasmājjaḍā eva jīvā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yadāgantukajñānaṃ jaḍasvabhāvaṃ tatkadācit parokṣaṃ kadācit saṃdigdhaṃ kadācidviparyastaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3323: tasmādvṛttayaḥ kriyārūpāḥ sakarmikāḥ karmābhāve suṣuptyādau nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3325: tathāca nityacaitanyavādinyaḥ śrutayo na kathañcit kleśena vyākhyātavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3335: sarvatra nityaprāptasya vā sarvātmakasya vā tadasaṃbhāvāditi //19//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3340: taccācalato 'pi tatra sato dehasvāmyanivṛttyopapadyate na tu gatyāgatī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3341: tayoścalane nirūḍhayoḥ kartṛsthabhāvayorvyāpinyasaṃbhavāditi madhyamaṃ parimāṇaṃ mahattvaṃ śarīrasyaiva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3343: gatyāgatī ca paramamahati na saṃbhavato 'taḥ pāriśeṣyādaṇutvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3344: gatyāgatibhyāṃ ca prādeśikatvasiddhau maraṇamapi dehādapasarpaṇameva jīvasya na tu tatra sataḥ svāmyanivṛttimātramiti siddhamityāha-satyośca gatyāgatyoriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3351: yata utkrāntyādiśrutibhirjīvānāmaṇutvaṃ prasādhitaṃ tato vyāpakātparamātmanasteṣāṃ tadvikāratayā bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3352: tathāca mahattvānantyādiśrutayaḥ paramātmaviṣayā na jīvaviṣayā ityavirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3353: yadi jīvā aṇavastato 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu'iti kathaṃ śārīro mahattvasaṃbandhitvena pratinirdiśyate iti codayati-nanviti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3355: yathā hi garbhastha eva vāmadevo jīvaḥ paramārthadṛṣṭyātmano brahmatvaṃ pratipede,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3362: uddhṛtya mānamunmānaṃ bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapi śatatamāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāga iti tadidamunmānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3367: aṇurātmā na śarīravyāpīti na sarvāṅgīṇaśaityopalabdhiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3369: tvaksaṃyukto hi jīvaḥ tvakca sakalaśarīravyāpinīti tvagvyāpyātmasaṃbandhaḥ sakalaśaityopalabdhau samartha ityarthaḥ //23//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3373: candanabindoḥ pratyakṣato 'lpīyastvaṃ buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3374: yasya tu saṃdigdhamaṇutvaṃ sarvāṅgīṇaṃ ca kāryamupalabhyate tasya vyāpitvamautsargikamapahāya neyaṃ kalpanāvakāśaṃ labhata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3382: ye tu sāvayavatvāccandanabindoraṇusaṃcāreṇa dehavyāptirupapadyate na tvātmano 'navayavasyāṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3383: tasmādvaiṣamyamiti manyante tān pratīdamucyate guṇādvā lokavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3394: viśleṣānupraveśābhyāṃ ca sannapi viśleṣaḥ sūkṣmatvānnopalakṣyate iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3399: upalabhyamāno vā sūkṣma upalabhyeta na sthūla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3414: na jātu ghaṭakarakādisaṃyogā nabhaso nabho vyaśruvate 'pitvalpāneva ghaṭakarakādīn,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3415: itarathā yatra nabhastatra sarvatra ghaṭakarakādyupalambha iti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3418_1: 'pyadhiṣṭhitā tvagadhiṣṭhitaiveti śarīravyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarvāṅgīṇaṃ śaityamanubhavituṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3419: aṇustu jīvo yatrāsti tasminneva śarīrapradeśe tadanubhavenna sarvāṅgīṇaṃ, tasyāsarvāṅgīṇatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3420: kaṇṭakatodanasya tu prādeśikatayā na sarvāṅgīṇopalabdhiriti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3423: ata eva hi hemante viṣaktāvayavāpyadravyagate 'tisāndre śītasparśe 'nubhūyamānepyanudbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ nopalabhyate yathā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3424: tathā mṛgamadādīnāṃ gandhavāhaviprakīrṇasūkṣmāvayavānāmatisāndre gandhe 'nubhūyamāne rūpasparśau nānubhūyete tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3428: apica caitanyaṃ nāma na gumo jīvasya guṇānaḥ, kintu svabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3429: naca svabhāvasya vyāpitve bhāvasyāvyāpitvaṃ, tattvapracyuterityāha-yadi ca caitanyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3436: apitu yo 'yaṃ mithyājñānadveṣādyanuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmamanubhavagocaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3437: naca brahmasvabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasya svataḥ icchādveṣānuṣaṅgasaṃbhava iti buddhiguṇānāṃ teṣāṃ tadabhedādhyāsena taddharmatvādhyāsaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3438: udaśarāvādhyastasyeva candramaso bimbasya toyakampe kamampavattvādhyāsa ityupapāditamadhyāsabhāṣye /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3469: antaḥkaraṇe 'pi sati tasya nityasaṃnidhānāt kasmānnityopalabdhyanupalabdhī na prasajyete /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3471: tāvasatyevāntaḥ karaṇe ātmano vendriyāṇāṃ vā stāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3486: nanu 'tadguṇasāratvāt'ityanenaiva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca labdhameveti tadvyutpādanamanarthakamityata āha-tadguṇasāratvādhikāreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3487: tasyaivaiṣa prapañco ye paśyantyātmā bhoktaiva na karteti tannirākaraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3495_0: buddhiścetkartrī bhoktā cātmā tato yasyāpekṣitopāyo bhoktuna tasya kartṛtvaṃ yasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:3495_1: kartṛtvaṃ naca tasyāpekṣitopāyā iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamiti śāstrasyānarthakatvamavidyamānābhidheyatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3496: yathā ca tadguṇasāratayāsyāvastusadapi bhoktṛtvaṃ sāṃvyavahārikamevaṃ kartṛtvamapi sāṃvyavahārikaṃ na tu bhāvikam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3501: vihāraḥ saṃcāraḥ kriyā, tatra svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3506: tadeteṣāṃ prāṇānāmindriyāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāyopādāyetyupādāne svātantryaṃ nākartuḥ saṃbhavati //35//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3512: sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇarūpā karaṇatvenaiva vyapadiśyate na kartṛtvena,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3526: karaṇādīni kārakāntarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayaṃ kārakāntaraiḥ prayujyata ityetāvanmātramasya svātantryaṃ na tu kāryakriyāyāṃ na kārakāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3527: īdṛśaṃ hi svātantryaṃ neśvarasyāpyatrabhavato 'stītyutsannasaṃkathaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3528: tathā cāyamadṛṣṭaparipākavaśādiṣṭamabhiprepsustatsādhanavibhrameṇāniṣṭopāyaṃ vyāpārayannaniṣṭaṃ prāpnuyādityaniyamaḥ kartṛtvaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3531: tena viṣayāvacchinnameva caitanyaṃ vṛttiriti vijñānamiti cākhyāyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3538: aviparyayāya tu karaṇāntarakalpanāyāṃ nāmni visaṃvāda iti //38//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3549: so 'yamiha kartātmā samādhāvupadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛtvamavaitīti sūtrārthaḥ //39//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3557: naca svābhāvike kartṛtve saṃbhavatyasatyapavāde tadaupādhikaṃ yuktam atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3559: yathā jñānasvabhāvo jñeyābhāve 'pi nājño bhavatyevaṃ kartṛsvabhāvo 'pi kriyāveśābhāve 'pi nākartā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3567_0: tasya ca kadācidapyasaṃsarge kathaṃ tacchaktiyogo nirviṣayāyāḥ śakterasaṃbhavāt tathāca
GSP33brsvbh2u:3567_1: yadi tatsidhyarthaṃ tadviṣaḥ kriyāveśo 'bhyupeyate tathā sati tatsvabhāvasya svabhāvocchedābhāvādbhāvanāśaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3569: kriyāyā duḥkhatvānna vigalitasakaladuḥkhaparamānandāvasthā mokṣaḥ syādityāśayavānāha-na svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamātmana iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3574: tathāca tayākṣiptaṃ śakyaṃ sadaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3578: asmākaṃ tu na mokṣaḥ sādhyaḥ, apitu brahmasvarūpaṃ tacca nityamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3583: parasmādanyaścetsa buddhyādisaṃghāta eveti, tasyaiva tarhi muktisaṃsārau nātmana iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3588_1: ātmaiko 'pi bhinna iva viśuddho 'pyaviśuddha iva tataścaikabuddhyādisaṃghātāpagame
GSP33brsvbh2u:3588_2: tatra mukta ivetaratra baddha iva yathā maṇikṛpāṇādyupadhānabhedādekameva mukhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3588_3: nāneva dīrghamiva vṛttamiva śyāmamivāvadātamiva anyatamopadhānavigame tatra muktamivānyatropahitamiveti
GSP33brsvbh2u:3590: nāpi buddhyādisaṃghātāsya kintu buddhyādyupahitasyātmasvabhāvasya jīvabhāvamāpannasyeti paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3596: takṣṇaḥ pāṇyādayaḥ santi tairayaṃ vāsyādīn vyāpārayan bhavatu duḥkhī,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3597: paramātmā tvanavayavaḥ kena manaḥprabhṛtīni vyāpārayediti vaiṣamyaṃ takṣṇo dṛṣṭāntenetyata āha-takṣadṛṣṭāntaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3601: manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇādīni vyāpārayan duḥkhītyetāvatāsya sāmyaṃ na tu sarvathā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3602: yathātmā ca jīvo 'vayavāntarānapekṣaḥ svaśarīraṃ vyāpārayatyevaṃ manaḥprabhṛtīni tu karaṇāntarāṇi vyāpārayatīti pramāṇasiddhe niyogaparyanuyogānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3604: yatparaṃ hi śāstraṃ sa eva śāstrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3606: tena yathālokasiddhaṃ kartāramapekṣya svaviṣaye pravartamānaṃ na puṃsaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamavagamayitutsahate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3609: aupādhikaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ nopādhyapagame saṃbhavatīti svābhāvikameva yujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3610: apica yatrāpi karaṇamasti tatrāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaśravaṇātsvābhāvikameva yuktamityāha-tathopādāne 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3613: apica svapne yādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tādṛśo vihāro 'pītyāha-vihāro 'pi ca tatreti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3615: yadyapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathāpi karmakaraṇopadhānakṛtamasya kartṛtvaṃ na śuddhasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3617: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛtvamapi tu karaṇādisahitasyaiva,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3621: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3625: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni bibhartti sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3627: tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha-upalabdhyapekṣaṃ tveṣāṃ karaṇatvam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3628: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha-naca tasyāṃ ulabdhāvapyasya svābhāvikakartṛtvamastikasmāt nityopalabdhisvarūpatvātātmanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3629: nahi nitye svabhāve cāsti bhāvasya vyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3634: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3635: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi buddhirupalabdhī bhavet, tatastasyā upalabdhṛtvamātmanyadhyavasyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3638: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3639: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha-na caivaṃ sati karaṇāntarakalpanābuddherupalabdhṛtvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3643: kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ vṛttiriti copalabdhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3644: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3648: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3649: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3651: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3652: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3653: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmapracayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3654: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābhyām /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3656: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā neyā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3657: 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādayastāvacchachrutayaḥ sarvavyāpāreṣu jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3659: naca śrutisiddhasya kalpanīyatā, yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3660: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3661: yadyapyayamīśvaro vītarāgastathāpi pūrvapūrvajantukarmāpekṣaya jantūn dharmādharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ viṣamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3665: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3667: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtve karotyeva jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3668: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstrāvirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati'ityādiśruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3671: 'iti smṛteśceśvaratantrāṇāmeva jantūnāṃ kartṛtvaṃ, na tu svatantrāṇāmiti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3672: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3673: na kevalamānarthakyaṃ viparītaṃ cāpadyeta ityāha-tathā vihitakāriṇamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3682: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke | BBs_2,3.43 |
GSP33brsvbh2u:3688: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ'ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3689: na caitābhirbhedābhedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni'ityādeḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3691: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3693: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3695: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥ tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri duḥkhamanubhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3696: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3698: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3701: advaitaśrutayastu jātideśakālābhedanimittopacārāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate-anadhigatārthāvabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3704: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3707: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3708: tasmādvaite bhāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3711: yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3712: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbitamapi /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3713: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabhāva iti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3730: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pañca viṣayā iti saptadaśako rāśiḥ //47//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3738: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanopariṇāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3740: ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3743: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3754: yo hyātmanaḥ ṣāṭkauśikāddehādupapattyāvyatirekaṃ veda, na tu samastabuddhyādisaṃghātavyatirekaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3756: samastabuddhyādivyatirekavedinastu karmabhoktṛtvābhimānarahitasya nādhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathāca na yatheṣṭaceṣṭā,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3765: yeṣāṃ tu sāṃkhyānāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vā sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāṃ pāramārthikīmicchatāṃ bahava ātmānaḥ sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3766: tatra praśnapūrvakaṃ sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramaṃ tāvadāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3767: yādṛśastādṛśo guṇasaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tatkṛte sukhaduḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3771: ayamarthaḥ-na pradhānaṃ svavibhūtīkhyāpanāya pravartate, kintu puruṣārtham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3772: yaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prayatnena bhogāpavargau puruṣārthau sādhitau taṃ prati samāptādhikāratayā nivartate puruṣāntaraṃ tu pratyasamāptādhikāraṃ pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3773: evaṃ ca muktasaṃsārivyavasthopapatteḥ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāpi bhaviṣyatīti nirākaroti-nahīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3774: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vibhutvāt pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamuṃ puruṣaṃ pratyanenārthaḥ sādhita ityetadeva nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3777: bhavatu sāṃkhyānāmavyavasthā, pradhānasamavāyādadṛṣṭasya, pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3778: kāṇādādīnāṃ tvātmasamavāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pratyātmamasādhāraṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca manasā sahātmanaḥ svasvāmibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho 'nādiradṛṣṭabhedānāmanāditvāt,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3781: nahi tasya manasa ātmāntarairyaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāmināpi,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3788: bhede hi tatkalpanā tataśca bheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3790: bhāṣyakṛtā tu prauḍhavāditayā kāṇādān pratyapyadṛṣṭāniyamādityādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3804: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3815: śabdaikapramāṇasamadhigamyā hi mahābhūtotpattistasyā yatra śabdo nivartate tatra tatpramāṇabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3820: rāddhāntastu syādetadevaṃ yadi sargādau prāṇasadbhāvaśrutirananyathāsiddhā bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3823: tatrādhikāripuruṣaḥ prajāpatirapranaṣṭa eva trailokyamātraṃ pralīnamatastadīyān prāṇānapekṣya sā śrutirupapannārthā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3848: ayamarthaḥ-yatrāpi tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau prāṇasṛṣṭirnokteti brūṣe, tatrāpyukteti brūmahe /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3863: eṣāṃ tu viṣayā atigrahāstvaṣṭāveva 'prāṇo vai grahaḥ so 'pānenātigraheṇa gṛhīto 'pānena hi gandhān jighrati'ityādinā saṃdarbheṇoktāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3866: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāgiti sapta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3869: nava vai puruṣe prāṇāsta uktā nābhirdaśamīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3871: tadyathā-buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇādīni pañca karmendriyāṇyapi hastādīni pañca ātmaikādaśa,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3878: atra praśnapūrvaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3884: ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotrādayaste prāṇā ityukte itareṣāmaśīrṣaṇyānāṃ hastādīnāmaprāṇatvaṃ gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3885: yathā dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte vāmena na paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3886_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi śrutivipratiṣedo yadyapi ca pūrvasaṃkhyāsu na parāsāṃ saṃkhyānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3900: naca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3908: nahi jātu mūkādayaḥ satsvapi viharaṇādyavagatasadbhāveṣu pādādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacanādimanto bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3913: ekameva tvantaḥkaraṇaṃ mananānmana iti cābhimānādahaṅkāra iti cādhyavasāyādbuddhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3916: tadevamekādaśānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ vyavasthānādekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutirāñjasī /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3918: tatrāvayutyanuvādena saptāṣṭanavadaśasaṃkhyāśrutayo yathaikaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte iti trīn vṛṇīta ityetadānuguṇyāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3919: dvādaśatrayodaśasaṃkhyāśrutī tu kathañcidvṛttibhedena bhedaṃ vivakṣitvopāsanādiparatayā netavye /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3921: apica śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ yatsaptatvābhidhānaṃ tadapi caturṣvevavyavasthāpanīyam,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3923: na khalu dve cakṣuṣī, rūpopalabdhilakṣaṇasya kāryasyābhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3924: pihitaikacakṣuṣastu na tādṛśī rūpopalabdhirbhavati yādṛśī samagracakṣuṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3928: iyamaparā sūtradvayayojanā-saptaiva prāṇāḥ cakṣurghrāṇarasanavākśrotramanastvaca utkrāntimantaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3932: tasmātsarvaśabdasya prakṛtāpekṣatvātsaptaiva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇyādaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3941: tasmācchrutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3947: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti manyante,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3948_0: tānpratyāha-aṇavaśca prāṇā anudbhūtarūpaspaśartā cāṇutvaṃ duradhigamatvānna tu paramāṇutvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3950: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3951: hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena śarīrāvacchinnānāmeva teṣāṃ karaṇatvamindriyatvamiti na vyāpināmindriyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3952: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3958_1: ca vyāpārānupapatte prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya
GSP33brsvbh2u:3960: kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3968: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ'iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3969: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā'iti vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya svarūpamastu,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3970: śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3971: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3973: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3977: na ca tvagekasādhyaṃ, tathā sati sāmānyavṛttitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3978: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3979: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3980: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:3981: tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo gamayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3984: kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ pañcavyūhaḥ prāṇa iti //9//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3988: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3989: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3992_0: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibhiḥ
GSP33brsvbh2u:3992_1: sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca puruṣārthatvāt puruṣaṃ prati pāratantryaṃ śayanāsanādivadbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:3993: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve 'svatantra iti //10//
GSP33brsvbh2u:3996: syādetaccakṣurādibhiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4002: ekādaśatvaṃ ca karaṇānāṃ vyākupyetāpi tu prāṇāntarāsaṃbhavi dehendriyavidhāraṇakāraṇaṃ prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4003: tacca śrutiprabandhena darśitaṃ na kevalaṃ śarīrendriyadhāraṇamasya kāryam //11//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4012: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4017: yadyapi cātrābhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirneṣyate tathāpi vikṣepasaṃskāralakṣaṇā manovṛttirihāstyeveti sarvamavadātam //12//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4023: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha-aṇuśca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4026: yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4027: tadāśrayāśca 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā'ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo dehasāmyameva prāṇasyāhuḥ svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnetavyā iti //13//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4031: yaddhi yatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa tāvadutsargaḥ parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4037: apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4038: tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4039: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-nānāvidhāsu tāvacchrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4042: saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4043: tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4045: anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī tadvaśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4048: nahi yantā rathamadhitiṣṭhinnapi tatsādhyavijayāderbhoktāpi tu svāmyeva /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4049: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvanmātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4051: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamayyo devatā arhanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4052: tasmāt prāṇānāmadhiṣṭhātryo devatā iti siddham, śeṣamatirohitārtham //14//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4065: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya śreṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4072: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādirmanaso 'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4073: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāṇāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4074: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttaya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4075: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-mukhyāt prāṇāttattvāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tatra tatra bhedena vyapadeśāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4083: tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4084: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4087: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4089: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4090: naca mukhyatvānurodhenāvagatabhedayoraikyaṃ yuktaṃ, mā bhūdgaṅgādīnāṃ tīrādibhiraikyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4091: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4092: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4099: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4103: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4116_0: satprakriyāyāṃ 'tatteja aikṣata'ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4116_1: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117_0: asyārthaḥ-pūrvoktaṃ bahubhavanamīkṣaṇaprayojanamadyāpi sarvathā na niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117_1: kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117_2: ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇadhāraṇakartrātmanānupraviśya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117_3: buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya
GSP33brsvbh2u:4117_4: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4118: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4120: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā'ityādiśrutivirodhādanadhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4122: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4123: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4126: tasya tu kvacitsākṣādasaṃbhavātparamparāśrayaṇaṃ, sākṣātsaṃbhavaśca yogyatayā darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4131: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4133: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4134: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4135: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya,
GSP33brsvbh2u:4137: nanvanyatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakarmaṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4144_0: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh2u:4144_1: vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve
GSP33brsvbh2u:4144_2: bhinnakartṛkatvena ktvaḥ prayogo vyāhanyetetyatrāha-naca jīvo nāmeti /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4151: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bhāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4158: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4159: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh2u:4164: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī-yadi sarvameva iti //21//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4168: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22//
GSP33brsvbh2u:4169: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
